post.author: pbmax
post.body:
http://www.steampowered.com/v/index.php ... &AppId=400

even if you're a cheapskate like me, you would find it hard to pass this deal up.

finished it in about one sitting. none of the puzzles were too hard (but i already knew how to kill the computer at the end). i got a little annoyed at some parts like the super long jumps that seemed to be more trial and error than puzzle solving. maybe i just wasn't very good at it.

good game.

post.body: I second this recommendation, it's a great game.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
yes. sad part is that valve counts re-sales of previous products as a new sale. IE everyone who owned HL1 & EP1 but bought orange box added a sale to HL2 & EP1, even though it won't really get used.

id should take a lesson: include a free copy of all their older games with their newer ones, charge an extra $15, don't sell it with out the extras & rack up HUGE sales on old games that people already own.
